Address.value: 8 MARINA BOULEVARD NO. 05-02,MARINA BAY FINANCIAL CENTRE, SINGAPORE, 18981, Singapore

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Maxeon Solar Technologies Ltd is engaged in the design, manufacture, and distribution of solar products. The product portfolio includes SunPower Maxeon Panels and SunPower Performance Panels. Geographically, it derives revenue from the U.S., France, China, Italy and Rest of the world.
